exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce UnitalSeparationAlgebra to an evaluable reference.

original: unfold UnitalSeparationAlgebra. intro H. split. - intros x. specialize (H emp TT). rewrite H. intros m. exists m. split. + intros y. rewrite fsepconSM. split; auto. + intros y. rewrite fempSM. auto. - intros m n. intros H1 H2. unfold IncreasingSeparationAlgebra. split. + intros x Hx. exists m. split. * intros y. rewrite fsepconSM. split; auto. * intros y. rewrite fempSM. auto. + intros x Hx. destruct Hx as [m' [Hm' Hx]]. exists m'. unfold residue. auto.
